assisted_progression:climbing_gloves.des: Have in your inventory to scale walls by walking into them
assisted_progression:electric_magnet.des: Attracts item entities and xp orbs, requires power. Shift+Right-Click to toggle activation
assisted_progression:hefty_bag.desc: Contains 18 slots, will void items matching filter on pickup
assisted_progression:magnet.desc: Attracts all sorts of things, some dangerous. Shift+Right-Click to toggle activation
assisted_progression:net.desc: Use with Mob Net Launcher to launch nets that capture mobs, right click to place captured mobs
assisted_progression:net_launcher.desc: Launches mob nets from inventory to capture mobs
assisted_progression:pipette.desc: Holds up to one bucket of fluid, useful for removing fluid amounts less than one bucket. Right click fluid handling tiles to insert and extract fluid
assisted_progression:spawner_relocator.d: Hold right click and release while looking at a spawner to pick it up, hold right click while aiming at a block to place it back down
assisted_progression:trash_bag.desc: Contains one slot, will void items matching filter on pickup
ender_pad.desc: Place another in the path of the arrow on top and sneak while standing on one to teleport to the other
parashoes.desc: Wear these shoes to slow your decent
player_player.desc: Pressure plate that will only activate for player entities
spawner_frame.desc: Right click with a mob net with a captured mob to create a spawner of that type
